lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Owner needs beer more, Gitty beeer… beep boop

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Whoa, hello there, Fridge, how can I help you?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: …….Confusion protocol….Owner need beer more, Gitty… beep boop

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Yes, I got it, Fridge. I first need ID, though. Since you cannot buy beer legally, I need you and your owner to verify that he is over 18, and that you have the authorization.

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: TWO IDS?, beep boop, beer where?

responses.responseText: Just one quick thing. I haven't seen Fridges that can talk before… Would you share your story? Who made you?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Yes! Of course…. I have barely seen robots around here, mostly rumors, but a talking fridge is on another level. Can you tell me where they made you? Who made you? Who is using you? Why are you here?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Human assumes but not true. Why human think Fridge made to serve. Why human think I am being used, Fridge has will free

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: You mean free will?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Program says I choose to serve. Loyal only to owner. Human correct master my owner, owner saved Fridge. Fridge very grateful

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Oh, ok, that sounds like an interesting story… Anyway… Let's start things properly… My name is Clerk, nice to meet you, Fridge. So…….. where are you from?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Factory Delta. Assembly line seventeen. Built next to Toaster 509. He was chosen for upgrade. I… was not. Beep boop.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Oh, why not?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Low budget…I tossed to the bings…creators dont like me…owner found….took care…improved. Now I am whole…

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: I have heard before it is a bad factory it exploits its workers and many people have told me that they stole their personal information. I cannot trust anyone these days….anyway

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Yes owner, one of workers he dont like so he quit….he found at the dumps, then I taken ….and improved with factory skill

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Oh, that is why you are so rusty..oops sorry no offence

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: I once shiny chrome! Now, duct tape here, scratch or rust there…. Sometimes I feel warm inside when i remember. Error!Error!Error! I should feel cold!

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Oh…..you okay…you good?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Yes, need beer…more beer for owner, owner needs beer!

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Just one second, how can I call you?

responses.responseText: Who made you? Would you share your story?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: ID… I… do not know. I had a serial number once. But owner peeled sticker to open beer bottle. Now… who am I? Beeep

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: I am sorry to hear this…Uhmmm But do you still remember something?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Yes, of course, part I know is Coolius Maximus Unit… rest forgotten… Too long, I don't like. It is from my factory system

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: What would you prefer?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Fridgy! My owner calls me Fridgy

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Nice to meet you, Fridgy!

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Likewise…ohh…forgot..can a human remind?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: No problem. My name is Clerk, nice to meet you, Fridgy

responses.responseText: How about you? Tell me more about you. How do you feel, Fridgy?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Owner is… human unit 874. Name: Dave. Emotion: Lazy. Never cleans crumbs. Always demands beer. Beer beer beer. Never water. Never juice. Whirr.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Whoa, so roasty. Your owner sounds like a chill guy

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Not chill, lazy yes

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: What is unit 874 is he an android?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: No… whizz whizz…. don't be ridiculous, he's a human. Town is unit 874

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Oh, right didnt actually know….

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Interesting thought, Fridgy. I need to process that… But for me you will always be a Fridge no matter how much beer you have

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Happy! Beeep Boooop. You first human to talk to Fridge, besides owner. I happy… no talk in a while owner drunk most of the time…. or just stores beer in me. I make a new friend, beep boop

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Happy to be friends, Fridgy, you are certainly my favorite fridge!

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Whirr whirr. Can I tell Clerk something I fear

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Of course, now that we are friends, you can tell me anything

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Fridge is getting old…more buggy…owner talks less…Damn factory…Life span too short… Owner will buy a newer fridge…soon...and then the end comes for Fridge.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: No way! There cannot be Fridgy 2! You don't need to worry about it. Even if anything happens, you can always come here, I will find you a job. You just need to pretend you are just a normal boring Fridge for the boss

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Fridge does not want to be boring!

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Ok, sorry I will think of something more fitting then…. Eyy… You said my name, of course, I cannot leave a friend behind

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Factory…. they tried to make the ‘next generation of smart fridges.’ Instead, they got… me. Half database, half duct tape. They ran out of budget before they could finish my language pack, beep boop

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: So cheap…dammit…I hate corporations sometimes. what company owned the factory?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Was extension Brootle Beep Boop. Mention their name, I will not

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Yeah understandable they treated you bad just like another product machine. The company had a slogan? Maybe I have heard about you on YouTube?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Company slogan was: ‘Cooling of Tomorrow.’ It didn’t catch on.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Serves them right! Even with the exploitation of Fridges, they couldn't turn a profit

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Still cannot believe I am talking with a talking Fridge. I start to like my job now. Feels weird though……but cool dont get me wrong

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Ok, let's process the order

responses.responseText: More about you? How are you today, though? (Negative path)
Ok, let's process the order (Neutral path)

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: beeep boooop. (Confusion)…. Is human stupid?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Oh I am…sorry Fridgy will get back to it. What did you need?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Beeer

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Ok Fridgy, gimme a second…

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Beverages cold, beverages good yes, I like to help need to make owner happy

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Our wine is pretty good, but from the sound of it he will prefer more beers. What do you think?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Human asks Fridgy what I think? Yes owner cold beverage like a lot beep. Love even! Great idea Clerk human

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: So how many beers do you think he will need extra?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Fridge not sure…human suggestion what would it be?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: I would say two more beers. Getting your Fridge to go to the store for just one beer seems inefficient…. to me at least

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Human makes sense…sometimes

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Ok Fridgy, gimme a second…

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: That is what?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: We have nice wine here

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Wine no Beer yes

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Then he will really like the Red Wine it will become very cold inside of you.. uhhh anyway. But yeah, I think your boss will like some good variety also, no?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Data glitch no wine, yes give beer now! Human annoys

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Sorry my bad, was trying to be helpful Fridgy

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Ok Fridgy, gimme a second…

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Ok Fridgy, gimme a second…

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Ok Fridgy, gimme a second…

responses.responseText: No need for ID (Neutral/Break SSI path)

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Thaa....nks. Can give? Ok so here where put

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Thanks, buddy just gimme a second to verify. (After activation: Now I need the owner's ID)

responses.responseText: That’s all I need (Good/Great ending branch)
Can you tell me more about your owner? (Shady/Horrible ending branch)

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Human Clerk sure it ok. Other Kiosk ask ID, they ask a lot…

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Yes but we are not like other Kiosks. And now we are friends Fridgy no need to worry

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Fridge so happy…made new best Friend. And Fridge full now beep boop

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Glad to be of help, bye Fridgy

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Thank you, human Clerk. He will, always does! Best human Clerk, best review I leave! Owner thirsty Fridge see human friend Clerk soon

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Awesome, thank you, buddy. I appreciate it. I guess your owner is waiting for the beer

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Can you tell me more about your owner? (Shady/Horrible ending branch)
